sentences.cn: 她的头发过早地苍白了。

sentences.en: He was careful not to celebrate prematurely.
sentences.cn: 他很谨慎，没有过早地举行庆祝活动。

sentences.en: The risk of heart disease increased 15% over a decade, and the odds of dying prematurely climbed 13% during a seven-year follow-up.
sentences.cn: 患心脏病的风险在10年内增加了15%，在随后7年的跟进中，过早死亡的机率上升了13%。
